files.README.md:
# moo

Claude answers fast. moo makes it answer right.

---

Before moo:
> "This should work" â†’ debug â†’ rebuild â†’ debug again

After moo:
> Think â†’ verify â†’ build once

---

## Try it

```bash
/plugin marketplace add saadshahd/moo.md
/plugin install hope@moo.md
```

Then:
```
plan building a markdown-to-PDF CLI
```

Claude will:
- Ask before building
- Search before writing
- Verify before claiming done

---

plugins.name: hope
plugins.description: clarify before you build. learn from failure. iterate with confidence.

plugins.name: product
plugins.description: PRD generation, competitive analysis, research synthesis, and goal systems for product work.

plugins.name: wordsmith
plugins.description: Voice extraction, precision editing, narrative structure, and copy evaluation for writing work.

plugins.name: founder
plugins.description: Complete workflows for startup validation, fundraising, and financial modeling with Marp slides and spreadsheet outputs.

plugins.name: career
plugins.description: Interview prep, skill assessment, STAR narratives, stakeholder navigation, and focus capacity analysis for career development.

plugins.name: counsel
plugins.description: Expert simulation for code guidance, style, and debates. Channels Addy Osmani, Rich Hickey, Adam Wathan, and more.

plugins.name: design
plugins.description: Design exploration workflows for research, direction-finding, and surfacing unknowns. Journey mapping, IA, visual directions, and UX comparison.

plugins.name: loop
plugins.description: Autonomous iteration with spec-driven quality gates. Uses Tasks API for state, Stop hooks for intelligent termination.

plugins.name: playground
plugins.description: Interactive HTML playgrounds for temporal exploration. Visualize systems and timelines, then extract insights.
